title: Pset_SpaceHeaterPHistory
description: Space heater performance history common attributes.

FractionRadiantHeatTransfer.title: FractionRadiantHeatTransfer
FractionRadiantHeatTransfer.description: Fraction of the total heat transfer rate as the radiant heat transfer.

FractionConvectiveHeatTransfer.title: FractionConvectiveHeatTransfer
FractionConvectiveHeatTransfer.description: Fraction of the total heat transfer rate as the convective heat transfer.

Effectiveness.title: Effectiveness
Effectiveness.description: Ratio of the real heat transfer rate to the maximum possible heat transfer rate.

SurfaceTemperature.title: SurfaceTemperature
SurfaceTemperature.description: Average surface temperature of the component.

SpaceAirTemperature.title: SpaceAirTemperature
SpaceAirTemperature.description: Dry bulb temperature in the space.

SpaceMeanRadiantTemperature.title: SpaceMeanRadiantTemperature
SpaceMeanRadiantTemperature.description: Mean radiant temperature in the space.

UACurve.title: UACurve
UACurve.description: UA curve as function of ambient temperature and surface temperature; UA = f (Tambient, Tsurface)

OutputCapacityCurve.title: OutputCapacityCurve
OutputCapacityCurve.description: Partial output capacity curve (as a function of water temperature); Q = f (Twater).

AirResistanceCurve.title: AirResistanceCurve
AirResistanceCurve.description: Air resistance curve (w/ fan only); Pressure = f ( flow rate).

Exponent.title: Exponent
Exponent.description: Characteristic exponent, slope of log(heat output) vs log (surface temperature minus environmental temperature).
